ygData.subject: Re: Featured Art
ygData.msgSnippet: ... guild ... Hmph.  I didn t see the choice in the list, but then, I stuck with Bertoxxulous.  Sheesh.  Couldn t they have spelled that some _other_ way? It s
ygData.messageBody:
> Well... you can. It depends on what god you are :) There is a necro
guild
> there... well hidden in a building in the slums.

Hmph. I didn't see the choice in the list, but then, I stuck with
Bertoxxulous. Sheesh. Couldn't they have spelled that some _other_ way?
It's not even in the instruction book (ha! big surprise, eh?), had to take a
note from the guild for the spelling.. anyways, I ramble.

But, I found the guild. I also found a secret entrance to it from
outside of the city, through -- drum roll -- a false wall in the side of the
outter city wall. You go in, and basically take any path that goes down.
You'll end up in the guild. In case you're wondering where the entrance is,
I don't know exactly. I just walked against the wall until I slipped it,
figured it'd be there. If you were coming out of the city, it'll be to your
left, and down quite a ways (after a corner or two, if I remember right).
You'll look a bit sillly, but if you really want to find it just do what I
done and walk against the wall until you're in.

> No... the Gods of fickle fate (OK, the designers with evil thoughts) put
> griffins in the low level (5-15 level range) hunting area. Sure... why
NOT
> put a 34th level monster in that mix!

Heh. Yes. After I lost my level to a giant spider (okay, so I got a
little too cocky but hey, the other giant spider and young kodiak didn't
help me any, either) and getting my cor, a Griffen thought I'd make a nice,
if not somewhat thin, quick snack. Of course, I _quickly_ offered myself to
the great beast (heh)....

I wonder if they were not somewhat pressured to put them in there, or
just plain demented. In Qeynos, it rains, _allot_. 'Course, as somebody
pointed out the Temple of Karana's there. However, I sometimes wonder if
they're playing on first impressions (oh cool, look at that griffen,
awsome!) to make people immediatly go out and brag and bring in more sales.
;)

> Sonoroud. Who vows revenge on griffins when he makes 35th or so...

Care to group it? *evil grin*

~Myskyra / Tunare
Looking for Befallen but dunno if it's in west or east 'cause he got two
answers. :p
